Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

timetk 0.1.1 2018-05-14

  • Added timeSeries to Suggests to satisfy a CRAN issue.

timetk 0.1.0 2017-07-25

  • Renamed package timetk. Was formerly timekit.
  • Improvements:
    • Fixed issue with back-ticked date columns
    • Update pkgdown
    • support for robets
